      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void lightLED(int colour, int lightTime)
      Turn on LED for lightTime seconds.
      void register(BicycleGarageManager manager)
      Register bicycle garage manager so that the pin code terminal knows which manager to call when a user has pressed a key.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        void register(BicycleGarageManager manager)
        Register bicycle garage manager so that the pin code terminal knows which manager to call when a user has pressed a key.
        Parameters:
        manager - BicycleGarageManager to register.

      • lightLED

        void lightLED(int colour,
            int lightTime)
        Turn on LED for lightTime seconds. Color: red color: RED_LED = 0 green color: GREEN_LED = 1
        Parameters:
        colour - Integer, the color specifies the LED light on the terminal which will light up.
        lightTime - Integer, the time that the LED light will be lit.
